title: A Dispatch from Reuter's [1940 - USA] (Edward G Robinson) biopic
description:
A Dispatch from Reuter's (1940 - USA)

Biography / Drama

starring . . . . Edward G. Robinson, Edna Best, Eddie Albert, Nigel Bruce
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0032396/


In 19th century England, journalist Paul Julius Reuter and his partner, Max Wagner, utilize messenger pigeons to connect telegraph stations across Europe. As time passes and technology outdates his system, Reuter invents a wire system that transmits news stories directly to newspapers. But when a rival business creates a faster telegraph system, Reuter must transmit high-profile news to stay on top of the industry. Biopic based on true events.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 640x480, 23.976 fps, 1844 Kbps, 01h29m38s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 256 kbps
Ratio: 4:3

TVRip brief corner logo, English audio, optional subtitles French and Spanish
